alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 11:05AM MST until March 06 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Northeast winds gusting up to 25 mph. * WHERE...Golden Valley, Musselshell, Northern Carbon, Northern Stillwater, and Southwestern Yellowstone. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult due to slick roads and poor visibility. This includes the Monday morning commute. Young livestock may be at risk from the wet and cold conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some roads will be wet today, then freeze quickly in the late afternoon and early evening. Be prepared for slick conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Southwestern Yellowstone
